channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 0a7c2fa1-6f28-41a4-86b8-e74937c63222
Display name: Tenant Contributor
Description: Allows users to create and manage Entra ID Tenants.
Link: https://management.azure.com/0a7c2fa1-6f28-41a4-86b8-e74937c63222?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 56e95fdc-3337-468d-b964-30d07f2a2018
Display name: Garnet PubSub Data Contributor
Description: Allows read and write access to all channels within the Garnet resource
Link: https://management.azure.com/56e95fdc-3337-468d-b964-30d07f2a2018?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: da9adf61-39cd-41d5-87a0-30b21f7270d8
Display name: Garnet PubSub Data Reader
Description: Allows read access to all channels within the Garnet resource
Link: https://management.azure.com/da9adf61-39cd-41d5-87a0-30b21f7270d8?api-version=2022-04-01
